file.name: casing-test.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
paths:
  /ok-kebab-case/{withParameter}: {}
  /ok-header:
    parameters:
      - name: Pascal-Ok
        in: header
    get:
      responses:
        default:
          headers:
            Another-Pascal-Ok: {}
  /header:
    parameters:
      - name: ko-header
        in: header
      - name: KO_REQUEST_HEADER
        in: header
    get:
      responses:
        "200":
          headers:
            KO_RESPONSE_HEADER:
              description: not allowed

          
  /ok-kebab-case:
    get:
      parameters:
      - name: snake_param
        in: query
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: camelParam
        in: query
        schema:
          type: string
  /KO_NON_KEBAB: {}
  /koNonKebab:
    get:
      parameters:
      - name: KOUPPERPARAM
        in: query
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: KO_PARAM
        in: query
        schema:
          type: string
components:
  schemas:
    koNonCamelSchema:
      type: string
      pattern: '[a-z]+'
    OkCamelSchema:
      type: string
      pattern: '[a-z]+'
    Ko-CamelSchema:
      type: string
      pattern: '[a-z]+'

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: /header: parameters: parse parameter "ko-header": parameter MUST contain either a schema property, or a content property
